articles.title: Virgin Australia crewmembers allegedly sexually assaulted and robbed in Fiji - CBS News
articles.description: The alleged attacks took place in the nightclub area of the city of Nadi, home to the international airport, officials said.
articles.content:
Fiji police are investigating allegations of theft and sexual assault on two Virgin Australia crew members in the early hours of New Year's Day, the government said Thursday.
